About Menu Location Contact

Welcome to Magnolia

Magnolia is located north of downtown Chicago in the newly revitalized neighborhood of Uptown, celebrating another year as one of Chicago's best restaurants. To show our appreciation to all our customers we are offering a vast array of fine dining specials. What better way to enjoy a night of Chicago fine dining than at Magnolia cafe. Our menu incorporates seasonal French American ingredients and other techniques.

Menu

Our gourmet menu is as colorful as the season. Learn more about our featured wines, dessert and popular dishes.

Reservations

All size reservations are welcome. Please call us at 773-728-8785, we kindly ask for at least 24 hours notice for parties over 10.

Private Dining

Magnolia offers private fine dining for up to 75 guests. We will make your occasion memorable.

Private Parties

Magnolia's private party room is a perfect match for rehearsals, dinner sites, wedding receptions, bar mitzvahs, high school and college reunions, romantic dates and marriage proposals.

Hours

Dinner

  • Mon Closed
  • Tue - Thu 5:30pm to 9:00
  • Fri - Sat 5:30pm to 9:00
  • Sun 5:00pm to 9:00pm

Brunch

  • Sun 10:00am to 3:00pm

Location

Magnolia is located at 1224 W. Wilson, Chicago, IL 60640, conveniently located just 2 blocks west of the Wilson red line stop, in the heart of Uptown.
